name: What's That Bird?
description:
Are you a Tweetaholic? Prove it as you race against time to identify the endless Twitter photos thrown at you. An original Multiplayer game that lets you compete with 3 friends or anyone in the world in real-time. Score perfect answers and steal time from your foes. Best of all, it's free!

・ Over 400 Twitter celebrities across 4 levels to play
・ Discover the top Twitter stars you should follow
・ Endless game play with Time Bonus
・ Level up and unlock harder questions
・ Fast-paced crazy quiz for Twitter lovers

"Battle of the Tweeters" AppAdvice


Note: Multiplayer game is free for everyone. To remove auto-match wait time, you can invite your Game Center friends to play.
